messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] All you kind people
messages.messageBody:
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I'm all sniffly and teary eyed. What a great daughter
you have and sooo wonderful for you (and her) that she
wants to talk about it! That is so fantastic and I'm
so glad you got so many replies from this list asie
from mine, in which I got so carried away typing and
not thinking beforehand, that I forgot to say anything
about hugging, or praying, or thinking about you and
dd, etc. I meant to really. :)
I am not the most thought out person.
I hope everything works out lovely and I got all warm
and fuzzy with the x's and o's thing. too sweet. Don't
you LOVE kids?????
Keep us informed.
-Bobbie

--- yuli womie <yuliwomie@...> wrote:
> I've had so many responses (both here and in email)
> to
> my post about my dd that I need time to process it
> all. So thank you all very much, but I might not
> answer right away. By the way, she woke up in a
> fantastic mood this morning. I'd left a note on her
> bed last night, and this morning she gave it back to
> me with a note saying she wanted to talk about it
> while we garden, which won't be today because it's
> cloudy and cold. And the back of the note was
> covered
> with X's and O's. :) Juli
>
> __________________________________________________
> Do You Yahoo!?
> Get email at your own domain with Yahoo! Mail.
> http://personal.mail.yahoo.com/
>


__________________________________________________

messages.subject: All you kind people
messages.msgSnippet: I ve had so many responses (both here and in email) to my post about my dd that I need time to process it all. So thank you all very much, but I might not
messages.messageBody:
I've had so many responses (both here and in email) to
my post about my dd that I need time to process it
all. So thank you all very much, but I might not
answer right away. By the way, she woke up in a
fantastic mood this morning. I'd left a note on her
bed last night, and this morning she gave it back to
me with a note saying she wanted to talk about it
while we garden, which won't be today because it's
cloudy and cold. And the back of the note was covered
with X's and O's. :) Juli

__________________________________________________
